title: San Francisco Development Pipeline
description: A. SUMMARY Snapshot of San Francisco's Development Pipeline as of the end of 2024 Q3. Tracking of construction and entitlement activity based on data from Department of Building Inspection's Permit Tracking System and the Planning Department's Project & Permit Tracking System, processed quarterly. For more information please see http://sfplanning.org/pipeline-report B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED The dataset is created by combining projects data from the City Planning Department and permit data from the Building Inspection Department to create a quarterly snapshot that shows when a project is filed to construction. C. Previously Published Quarterly Pipeline Datasets As of the end of 2024 Q3, this page serves as the latest snapshot of San Francisco Development Pipeline and will be updated quarterly. All previously published quarterly snapshots currently hosted as separate datasets on the Open Data Portal, will be retired and removed from the portal. To request previous quarterly snapshots of San Francisco Development Pipeline, please contact dataset owner. D. UPDATE PROCESS The Development Pipeline is updated as a quarterly snapshot of the construction development in the City of San Francisco. E. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET Each row or record is a project or permit. They are fitted with information such as address, block lot, project case number and spatial data that allow users to find the specific project. Each row also contains project specific information such as project description and details to illustrate the scope of the project. F. DATA NOTES Reporting Update Significant data and systems improvements are underway to produce a more accurate quarterly pipeline, so the data may change at any time. Weekly and monthly data on Planning Applications and Building Permits can be accessed via the City's Open Data Portal. Change in Status Definitions The following changes have been made in status definitions since the 2022 Q1 Pipeline Report to align the Quarterly Pipeline Reports with other Housing Reports (Housing Inventory and Regional Housing Needs Allocation (RHNA) Annual Progress) (1) Construction: projects that are authorized for construction deemed to be in the construction stage. A project is considered to be authorized for construction if it has: - an issued full building permit, OR - an issued site permit with an approved first construction document Past definition: projects that had their first inspection were deemed to be in the construction stage. (2) Building Permit Issued: includes projects that have an issued site permit but don’t yet have their first construction document. Housing units for these projects are not yet counted toward RHNA progress. Past definition: included projects with any type of permit (site or full building permit) in the issued status. A data dictionary can be downloaded from the following link: https://sfplanninggis.s3.amazonaws.com/SF+Quarterly+Developement+Pipeline+Data+Definition+12212023.xlsx

columns.name: BLKLOT
columns.description: Assessor Block and Lot Number (also known as Parcel Number)

columns.name: NAMEADDR
columns.description: Project street address or project name

columns.name: approved date planning
columns.description: Project received approval from authoring agency but not necessary entitlement from the Planning Commission

columns.name: has approved entitlement
columns.description: Has an approved major entitlement.

columns.name: current status
columns.description: Most recent or current development pipeline project status

columns.name: current status date
columns.description: Date at which the pipeline project entered its current status

columns.name: new pipeline units
columns.description: A project's new gross units that is still in the pipeline; i.e. hasn't yet received a TCO/CFC (proposed units-existing units+demolition units- TCO units)

columns.name: existing units
columns.description: Number of existing dwelling units at the project site

columns.name: proposed units
columns.description: Number of proposed dwelling units at the project site

columns.name: demo units
columns.description: Number of existing units that are/will be demolished as part of the proposed project's scope

columns.name: net pipeline units
columns.description: A project's new net units that is still in the pipeline (proposed units-existing units-TCO units)

columns.name: completed new units
columns.description: A project's net new units that have received TCO or CFC (deemed complete) and are not in the pipeline any more

columns.name: pipeline affordable units
columns.description: Gross new affordable units in the pipeline that have not receive any TCO or CFC document

columns.name: Aff Estimation Type
columns.description: Confirmed: affordability levels are based on MOHCD's affordable pipeline; Estimate: affordability levels are not declared by the projects sponsor but estimated based on similar prior projects; Preliminary Data: affordability levels are based on project sponsor’s application but it’s subject to change.

columns.name: bmr units ex low
columns.description: A project's units that are affordable to extremely low income households (Household income < 30% of Area Median Income)

columns.name: bmr units very low
columns.description: A project's units that are affordable to very low income households (Household income < 50% of Area Median Income)

columns.name: bmr units low
columns.description: A project's units that are affordable to low income households (Household income < 80% of Area Median Income)

columns.name: bmr units moderate
columns.description: A project's units that are affordable to moderate income households (Household income < 120% of Area Median Income)

columns.name: affordability type
columns.description: Shows if a projects is 100% affordable or inclusionary (Section 415) - in the case of inclusionary projects, it shows how the project meets the inclusionary requirements

columns.name: tenure type
columns.description: Type of residential tenure (i.e. ownership or rental)

columns.name: case no
columns.description: Planning Department's Case Number

columns.name: BPA no
columns.description: Building permit application number

columns.name: BPA form no
columns.description: Building permit form number  (1 and 2 for new construction, 3 and 8 for alternation, 6 for demolition) - when a project includes more than one unit-changing permit, only one permit is listed. I demolition permit is listed if the project's only unit changing permit is a demo permit.

columns.name: is site permit
columns.description: Building permit type; issuance of site permit allows the applicant to start limited activities related for site preparation, but doesn't authorize the construction. Site permit needs additional approval from the Department of Building (DBI) for the start of construction.

columns.name: description Planning
columns.description: Description from the Planning Department's project record

columns.name: description DBI
columns.description: Description from the Department of Building Inspection's Permit Tracking System (PTS)

columns.name: non residential total GSF
columns.description: Non-residential (Commercial) gross square footage

columns.name: non residential net GSF
columns.description: Net change in non-residential (commercial) gross square footage

columns.name: CIE EXIST
columns.description: Existing Cultural, Institutional or Educational square footage

columns.name: CIE
columns.description: Proposed Cultural, Institutional or Educational square footage

columns.name: CIENET
columns.description: Net change in Cultural, Institutional or Educational square footage

columns.name: MED EXIST
columns.description: Existing Medical square footage

columns.name: MED
columns.description: Proposed Medical square footage

columns.name: MEDNET
columns.description: Net change in Medical square footage

columns.name: MIPS EXIST
columns.description: Existing Office/MIPS gross square footage

columns.name: MIPS
columns.description: Proposed Office/MIPS total square footage

columns.name: MIPSNET
columns.description: Net change in Office/MIPS square footage

columns.name: PDR EXIST
columns.description: Existing Production, Distribution Repair gross square footage

columns.name: PDR
columns.description: Proposed Production, Distribution, Repair total square footage

columns.name: PDRNET
columns.description: Net change in Production, Distribution, Repair square footage

columns.name: RET EXIST
columns.description: Existing Retail gross square footage

columns.name: RET
columns.description: Proposed Retail total square footage

columns.name: RETNET
columns.description: Net change in retail square footage

columns.name: VISIT EXIST
columns.description: Existing Hotel gross square footage

columns.name: VISIT
columns.description: Proposed Hotel square footage

columns.name: VISITNET
columns.description: Net change in Hotel square footage

columns.name: PLANNER
columns.description: Planner to whom the project was assigned at the end of publishing quarter

columns.name: SPONSOR
columns.description: Project Sponsor

columns.name: CONTACT
columns.description: Project Contact Name

columns.name: CONTACTPH
columns.description: Project Contact Phone Number

columns.name: DA
columns.description: Major multiphase development projects (including projects with a development agreement)

columns.name: LEGALIZATION
columns.description: Binary - it's true if for projects that use the legalization program to legalize previously unauthorized units

columns.name: ADU
columns.description: Binary - it's True for pipeline projects that include the development of accessary dwelling units

columns.name: state density
columns.description: Binary - it's True if the pipeline project uses State Density Bonus

columns.name: planning district
columns.description: Planning District in which the project is located

columns.name: SD22
columns.description: Supervisorial District (based on 2022 districts) in which the project is located

columns.name: NHOOD37
columns.description: Analysis Neighborhood (an analysis geography created by planning department) in which the project is located

columns.name: NHOOD41
columns.description: 1990 Neighborhood Boundaries in which the project is located

columns.name: zoning district
columns.description: 1990 Neighborhood Boundaries in which the project is located

columns.name: height district
columns.description: Height District in which the project is located

columns.name: PDA
columns.description: Priority Development Area (ABAG) in which the project is located

columns.name: SUD
columns.description: Special Use District in which the project is located

columns.name: planning area
columns.description: Planning Area

columns.name: longitude
columns.description: Latitude of the project's location

columns.name: latitude
columns.description: Latitude of the project's location
